title: The Sims 4 RELOADED update 5 + NO ORIGIN crack Mr DJ
description:
The Sims 4 RELOADED update version v1.0.797.20 + NO ORIGIN crack...
The Sims 4 Ghosts feature is also enabled....

This is meant for those who have my "The Sims 4 repack Mr DJ" which is based on 3DM Release, other 3DM release with update 2 is also compatible with this update....
No further updates required...

This release includes all DLCs from the digital deluxe edition as well as 
all available rewards for owners of The Sims 3 and its expansions.

Read 'Whatsnew' textfile provided to see the patch notes for this version....

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. UNINSTALL ORIGIN [Optional] ....
2. DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING 'setup' ....
3. INSTALL IT TO THE SAME LOCATION WHERE YOU HAVE INSTALLED YOUR SIMS 4 GAME, CLICK ON BROWSE AND SPECIFY THE DIRECTORY ...
4. ADD THE SIMS 4 GAME FOLDER TO THE EXCLUSION/EXCEPTION LIST OF YOUR ANTIVIRUS OTHERWISE YOUR ANTIVIRUS WILL CHANGE THE 'TS4.exe' FILE INTO A TEMPORARY FILE WHICH WON'T LET THE GAME TO RUN, AFTER THIS U CAN ENABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS....

BEFORE INSTALLING THE UPDATE, OPEN THE SIMS 4 FOLDER WHERE U HAVE INSTALLED THE GAME, OPEN 'Game' FOLDER IN IT, THEN OPEN 'Bin' FOLDER, NOW U CAN DELETE '3dmgame.dll' AND '3dmgame.ini' FILES PRESENT IN IT WHICH WERE THE PREVIOUS 3DM CRACK ....

ALWAYS OPEN THE GAME USING 'Run as administrator' TO AVOID ANY CRASH....

ALL CREDIT GOES TO RELOADED FOR THE HARD WORK....
